text: isamen (huramat kee) bahut see vaaze aur raushan nishaaniyo hain (unamen se) muqaam ibaraaheem hai (jaho aapake qadamon ka patthar par nishaan hai) aur jo is ghar mein daakhil hua aman mein aa gaya aur logon par vaajib hai ki mahaz khuda ke lie khaanae kaaba ka haj karen jinhe vahaan tak pahunchane kee istetaat hai aur jisane baavajood kudarat haj se inkaar kiya to (yaad rakhe) ki khuda saare jahon se beparava hai
